message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price of $10,000. This is a special opportunity to own a product that is truly exceptional and tailored to meet your needs, valued at $12,000 by you. Let's make this deal happen!
Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate the value you see in your product, but $10,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it.  What do you think?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. I am willing to consider your offer of $9,000. However, to reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I propose a price of $9,500 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise considering its value to you and the price you're willing to pay.
